shortdesc.ph: Callback when the first local audio frame is published.
Occurs when the first local audio frame is published.
Callback when the first local audio frame is published.
Occurs when the first local audio frame is published.

p.codeblock: final void Function(RtcConnection connection, int elapsed)? onFirstLocalAudioFramePublished;
public virtual void OnFirstLocalAudioFramePublished(RtcConnection connection, int elapsed) {}

section.p:
The SDK triggers this callback in the following situations:
After successfully joining a channel by calling with local audio enabled.
After calling muteLocalAudioStream(true) followed by muteLocalAudioStream(false).
After calling followed by .

The SDK triggers this callback in the following scenarios:
After successfully joining a channel by calling with local audio enabled.
After calling muteLocalAudioStream(true) and then muteLocalAudioStream(false).
After calling and then .

The SDK triggers this callback under the following circumstances:
After successfully joining a channel by calling with local audio enabled.
After calling muteLocalAudioStream(true) followed by muteLocalAudioStream(false).
After calling followed by .

The SDK triggers this callback in the following situations:
After successfully joining a channel by calling with local audio enabled.
After calling MuteLocalAudioStream(true) and then MuteLocalAudioStream(false).
After calling and then .
After successfully pushing an audio frame to the SDK using .

plentry.pd: The time elapsed (ms) from calling to the triggering of this callback.
Time elapsed (ms) from calling until this callback is triggered.
The time elapsed (in milliseconds) from calling the method to triggering this callback.
The time elapsed (ms) from calling to the triggering of this callback.
